articles.title: Accounting firms KPMG and PwC to exit Russia - Reuters.com
articles.description: Two of the Big Four accounting firms KPMG and PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (PwC) on Sunday said they will no longer have a member firm in Russia due to the country's invasion of Ukraine.
